name: tavernbot
releasenotes: Recently updated: !dice parses dice commands now! Try it with '!dice 1d20 + 5, 3d6 + 5' or something. Also, !stats lets you choose how it works: does 4d6k3 by default, and allows 3d6, funnel (which is 3d6), and 2d6+6 as input
description: A Dungeons and Dragons GM bot for discord, written in Node. This bot supports common tabletop RPG functionality, common Discord operations, and more

scripts.build: echo Placeholder text for smushing libs into an rpgapp.js for web page usage

author: jakethedev
